all_questions.question: What is the benefit of including all word forms from the monolingual data in the translation model?
all_questions.context: The increasingly large monolingual data with this reverse translation trick and you include all the word forms that appear in the monolingual data also in your translation model then you get double the increase.

all_questions.question: What is the disadvantage of using this method?
all_questions.context: The increasingly large monolingual data with this reverse translation trick and you include all the word forms that appear in the monolingual data also in your translation model then you get double the increase. Unfortunate.
